com.jbion.utils.xml.serialization.serializers

Class ObjectSerializer<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jbion.utils.xml.serialization.serializers.Serializer<T>
      • com.jbion.utils.xml.serialization.serializers.ObjectSerializer<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type managed by this serializer.

    public abstract class ObjectSerializer<T>
extends Serializer<T>
    An XML serializer for any class whose non-transient fields have a corresponding Serializer. Only the fields that have to be serialized have to be associated with a Serializer.

    Note that the type variable here does not have to implement Serializable. Even if the concepts of transient and non-transient fields are used in the descriptions of the methods of this class, the keyword transient does not have to be used.

    Author:
    Joffrey Bion
    See Also:
    Serializer

      ObjectSerializer(Class<T> clazz)
      Creates a new ObjectSerializer to handle objects of the specified class.
